title: Endless Dread: Olga of Kiev
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Olga of Kiev executed one of the most bone-chilling revenge tours in history after her husband, Igor, was murdered. Then, with a burning city in her wake, she converted to Christianity and became a saint.
itunes:author: WBUR
